title: Gemcraft 2 Chasing Shadows v1.0.14 Cracked
description:
Gemcraft: Chapter 2: Chasing Shadows, version 1.0.14


This cracked version differs from the official version in the following ways:

- Can play it locally from your hard-drive..
- Premium mode is enabled, so you have access to all skills, and also endurance mode..
- The flash version check has been disabled..

Starting with version 1.0.13 the flash version requirements went from 11.7 to 11.2 so that it can be played on linux, however, just in case, in this cracked version the check for flash version has been disabled, meaning you can use any flash version, even pre-11.2..


The official change-log from version 1.0.14 is as follows:

> Fixed: when playing with the Orblets trait, if a monster carrying an orblet is banished by a WoE spell, the orblet loses its way
> Shrines of Venom and Blades powers have been decreased and limited to 50% of target hp
> Disabled the rollover alert sound on trait buttons with not enough sc to set higher
> If there's no place for a spark to place a mana shard, only the mana invested in the shard is returned
> Fixed exploit: the Prism Cascade spark doesn't decrease spell and shrine charging times anymore
> Fixed exploit: dragging a gem from a trap to the inventory for combination added the combination cost instead of subtracting it
> If there are no more waves to come, shadows get much more aggressive (spawnlings and projectiles arrive faster and increase in number faster)


Any way, have fun with this cracked gemcraft.. It will be years before the next gemcraft is released..

Love and light,
signed your most bestest friend that you never had because you were too scared to talk to me when we passed by each other in real life that one day,
okonomiyaki
